page.title: 09HELSBY LIBRARY
page.content: Helsby Library was built in l979 and opens four days per week, a total of 23.l/2 hours. There is a full time head librarian and two helpers. The library has approximately l8,OOO books including fiction, non-fiction, permanent information books and a children's section. A book may be borrowed for three weeks and then renewed. Fines for overdue books are 6p a day on adult tickets and 2p on Junior tickets. Old books are sold or destroyed. Tapes may also be borrowed. The library is used for school visits, studying, meetings and exhibitions. The busiest times of the week are Tuesday and Friday evenings when up to thirty people could be in the library.
